long: Meaning: properly, "leanness", i.e. (figuratively) "limitation"; only adverbial, "merely", or conjunctional, "although".  Usage: but, even, except, howbeit howsoever, at the least, nevertheless, nothing but, notwithstanding, only, save, so (that), surely, yet (so), in any wise.  Source: the same as "H7534" as a noun;
